titleStmt.title: The quæstion of tythes reuised Arguments for the moralitie of tything, enlarged, and cleared. Obiections more fully, and distinctly answered .Mr. Seldens historie, so farre as mistakers haue made it argumentatiue against the moralitie, ouer-ly viewed. By William Sclater, D.D. and minister of Pitmister, in Somerset.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1575-1626.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The ministers portion.
"Though this has the headline: "The ministers portion", this is a different work from STC 21841, published in 1612."--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
